blister.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a swelling on your skin containing clear liquid, caused, for example, by a burn or continuous rubbing
blister.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: New shoes always give me blisters.
blister.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a swelling on the surface of metal, rubber, painted wood etc
blister.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to develop blisters, or make blisters form
blister.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The paint will blister in the heat.
